name: Bug Grub
description:
Bug Grub

Made for the GBJAM 10.

Description

Bug grub is a high score Game Boy style video game where you, a Venus Fly Trap, has to eat all the light coloured flies while avoiding the darker coloured wasps, which will poison you. Eating the hearts gives you back 1/2 of a heart.

Controls

Up/Down/Left/Right or WASD (Game Boy d-pad) to move.

C (Game Boy start button) to start.
